title.narrative: Humanitarian advisory support for rapid deployment

description.narrative: This activity (Humanitarian advisory support for rapid deployment) is a component of Support to the Enabling Environment for Humanitarian Response in Yemen (2015-16) reported by FCDO, with a funding type of 'Humanitarian assistance' and a budget of £762,912. This component benefits Yemen, and works in the following sector(s): Relief co-ordination and support services. , with the following implementing partners: Crown Agents Limited. The start date is 04-08-2015 and the end date is 31-03-2017.

owner-org.narrative: UK - Foreign, Commonwealth and Development Office (FCDO)

mailing-address.narrative: Public Enquiry Point, Abercrombie House, Eaglesham Road, East Kilbride, Glasgow G75 8EA
